subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:
    This is to inform you that you have been selected to be among the 2023 Bayerische Motoren Werke GmbH(BMW) of $12,500,000 US Dollars and Brand
    New and BMW SUV Car only. The selection process was was processed through The Bayerische Motoren Werke GmbH (BMW)
    computerized email selection system, from a database of over 200,000 email addresses obtained from all continents of the world
    which you were selected among.
    The BMW Charity Pro-Am is a golf tournament on the Korn Ferry Tour. It is currently played at ... Korn Ferry Tour events · Golf in South
    Carolina · Golf in North Carolina · Recurring sporting events established in 1992. This is done to support charity work, and
    democratization efforts and civil society organizations around the world. We are delighted to inform you that due to mixed
    up of emails, names and numbers, your name attached to approved number XX876/57EZ, therefore, you are advised to contact the Bayerische
    Motoren Werke GmbH(BMW) European Automaker Coordinator and heads BMW's plant USA Mr.Robert Engelhorn, to claim your $12,500,000 US Dollars.
    Name: Robert Engelhorn
    Tell; (971) 208-5743
    email; 
bmw306614@gmail.com
 
 Contact him by providing him with the under listed information as soon
    as possible.
    1. Name In Full :
    2. Address :
    3. Occupation ;
    4. Nationality :
    5. Direct Phone :
    Be inform that Mr.Robert Engelhorn is the Bayerische Motoren Werke GmbH(BMW) European Automaker Coordinator and heads BMW's plant USA.
    He is responsible for the smooth and efficient release of all beneficiary funds globally including your 2023 United Nations
    Democracy Fund of $12,500,000 USD and Brand New and BMW SUV Car only, so contact him immediately with this information as required above.
    Congratulations once again.
    Mr. Sebastian Mackensen
    President & CEO for BMW of North America and head of BMW Group Region Americans

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information about being selected by Bayerische Motoren Werke BMW. It sounds like quite an exciting opportunity! I'm curious to learn more about how this selection process works. Can you please explain to me how my email address was chosen among so many others from around the world?

Also, could you provide some additional details about the BMW Charity golf tournament? I'm interested in knowing more about the charity work and efforts it supports.

Regarding claiming the US Dollars and the BMW SUV Car, could you clarify what steps I need to take? How can I be sure that this is a legitimate offer from Bayerische Motoren Werke BMW?

Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Larry
